name: Button Buddies
description:
For Mini Jam 48, I created Button Buddies.

This game is mean't for two players, but it is possible for one person to control both characters. Shoot hearts at each-other to regain health points, and dodge the red bullets that fly across the screen.

This game was made in two days using the Godot game engine.

It is a very simple game, but I hope that you can get some enjoyment out of it. :)
